nodes.text: Phateem was an uninhabited planet located in the Nouane sector, near Telerath, covered in bamboo forests and mountains. The Ashlendu Mountains on Phateem contained the Halls of Knowledge, a former Jedi artifact cache. A tournament was held at the Halls of Knowledge, though it was a front for an operation led by Imperial Security Bureau Colonel Sadao Emtri to catch Force-sensitive individuals.
